info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 30 at 6:30PM EDT until March 30 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Melbourne FL
info.description:
TORMLB
The National Weather Service in Melbourne has issued a
* Tornado Warning for... South central Orange County in east central Florida... North central Osceola County in east central Florida...
* Until 700 PM EDT.
* At 629 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Lake Hart, or near Narcoossee, moving east at 15 mph.
HAZARD...Tornado.
SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation.
IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely.
* This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Orange and north central Osceola Counties.
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.

parameter.value: NWS: TORNADO WARNING in this area til 7:00 PM EDT. Take shelter now. Check media.

National Weather Service: TORNADO WARNING in this area until 7:00 PM EDT. Take shelter now in a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Check media.

parameter.value: SNM:AVISO DE TORNADO hasta las 7:00 PM EDT. Refugiese ahora. Consulte medios informativos

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE TORNADO en efecto hasta las 7:00 PM EDT. Busque refugio ahora en un sotano o en el interior de un cuarto en el nivel mas bajo de un edificio seguro. Si esta al aire libre, en una casa movil, o en un vehiculo, debe ir al edificio seguro mas cercano y protegerse de proyectiles. Consulte los medios informativos.
